title: Merge Sort
algorithmDescription: Sort array using merge sort algorithm with divide and conquer approach
detailedDescription: Implement merge sort algorithm to sort an array. Input: First line has n (array size), second line has n space-separated integers. Output: Sorted array in ascending order. Use divide and conquer: recursively divide array in half, sort each half, then merge sorted halves.
hints: Divide: split array into two halves recursively until single elements
Conquer: merge two sorted arrays into one sorted array
Base case: array of size 1 is already sorted
solutionApproach: Recursively divide array in half until base case (size 1). Merge function combines two sorted subarrays: compare elements from each, add smaller to result. Continue until both subarrays exhausted.
testCaseCriteria: Must correctly sort arrays using merge sort algorithm. Should demonstrate O(n log n) behavior. Must use divide and conquer.
